messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Back And Looking For Someone
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/28/2004 1:36:37 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Hi Kim, I m so sorry to hear about your mother and wish you peace during this difficult
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/28/2004 1:36:37 PM Eastern Standard Time,
CabinOnTheLedge@... writes:

>
> I came home and my computer crashed. I lost everything on it. I am looking
> for a woman here named Gail. Her daughter was talking with our son about
> photography before we left unexpectedly. Gail, can you have your daughter
> e-mail him

Hi Kim,

I'm so sorry to hear about your mother and wish you peace during this
difficult time.

I'll have Brenna e-mail your son again. She's been carrying her camera
around with her everywhere and planning on getting some of her pictures today. A
friend had a old Nikon
telephoto lens laying around the house and gave it to Brenna a couple of
weeks ago. She was so excited and now has her regular lens, the macro we gave her
for Christmas and the telephoto. Cool stuff!

Enjoy catching up on your reading and take care of you,

Gail


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Back And Looking For Someone
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, Hope everyone here is doing good. Wow, this list has been busy, I have lots of reading to do. We left home unexpectedly to be with mom as the
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

Hope everyone here is doing good. Wow, this list has been busy, I have lots
of reading to do.

We left home unexpectedly to be with mom as the doctors told us she had maybe
3 days to live. 3 days turned into 3 weeks. We stayed by her side the entire
time. At the end she went 10 days without food or water. It had to be the
hardest thing that my family and I have gone through. Now she rests in peace.

I came home and my computer crashed. I lost everything on it. I am looking
for a woman here named Gail. Her daughter was talking with our son about
photography before we left unexpectedly. Gail, can you have your daughter e-mail him
again or e-mail me with your addy? I'm so sorry he never responded to her but
we lost everything when the computer went.

Off to do the one thing I missed most......read!

Kim
